tests.query: create table tbl (s String, i int) engine MergeTree order by i;
tests.name: 01851_fix_row_policy_empty_result.sql

tests.query: drop row policy if exists filter on tbl;
tests.name: 01851_fix_row_policy_empty_result.sql

tests.query: create row policy filter on tbl using (s = 'non_existing_domain') to all;
tests.name: 01851_fix_row_policy_empty_result.sql

tests.query: select * from tbl prewhere s = '123' where i = 123;
tests.name: 01851_fix_row_policy_empty_result.sql

tests.query: drop row policy filter on tbl;
tests.name: 01851_fix_row_policy_empty_result.sql
